name:name: # ^ craftTime: 'ushort' range type (unsigned short, 0 to 65535) representing seconds
# ^ successRate: 'ratio' type - a map of names to percentages that MUST sum to 100%
# ^ materials[*] / materials[*]= : exploded MAP columns using bracket notation
# ^   materials[N] is the map KEY (item name), materials[N]= is the map VALUE (quantity)
# ^   The = suffix marks the value column of a key-value pair
# ^   This creates a map type {name:integer} mapping item names to quantities needed
ironSwordRecipe
result:name: ironSword
materials[1]:name: healthPotion
materials[2]:name: manaPotion
materials[3]:name: earthAmulet
description:text: Forge an iron sword from basic components
